contentfulPage.title: Thank you for wanting to volunteer

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Thank you for filling out the volunteer form for The COVID Tracking Project at The Atlantic.

Please be aware that we are a small project that runs primarily on volunteer effort, and we average about ten volunteer applications per day, so we may not be able to respond to your application. If we think you would be of help to the project, we will usually contact you within a few weeks.

Please also know that we are extremely grateful for your desire to help out on this particular effort in our common crisis. Stay safe and take care.
